name: ADDICT.
description:
. We, the Baguette friends Studio, created this game for the 48th Ludum Dare "DEEPER AND DEEPER". 

                  /!\ Warning photosensitive content /!\

Our first volontee was to create an experience instead of a skilled game. It means that our game will not challenge your skills but your feelings. We will use the gameplay as a way to let the play pass through several emotions or feeling that an addict could feel. 

Have a nice journey and remember: don't let your addiction control your mind.

We hope you will enjoy yourself and we would love to hear your feebacks !

Some baguette friends <3
